name: Charlotte Church
description:
'''Charlotte Maria Church''' (born '''Charlotte Maria Reed''', 21 February 1986) is a Welsh singer-songwriter, actress, and television presenter from [[Cardiff]].

As a child, Church was a popular [[Classical music|classical singer]] with a less-successful attempt to move into pop music in 2005. By 2007, she had sold more than ten million records worldwide including over five million in the United States. She hosted a [[Channel 4]] chat show titled ''[[The Charlotte Church Show]]''. Church released her first album in five years, titled ''Back to Scratch'', on 25 October 2010. Church is a [[soprano]].

Church has embraced political activism, supporting [[Jeremy Corbyn]] when he led the [[Labour Party (UK)|Labour Party]], [[Plaid Cymru]] in the [[List of Senedd elections|Senedd elections]], and the cause of [[Welsh independence]].
